item.title: Red Hat Support on JBoss EAP in Containers
item.description: Red Hat Support on JBoss EAP in Containers Red Hat JBoss Middleware Product Update and Support Policy Life Cycle and Update Policies Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform Life Cycle Policy Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform (EAP) 7 Supported Configurations Support Guidelines for Red Hat Middleware Products Deployed in 3rd-party Environments Support for Red Hat JBoss Middleware Containers
